tool_description: Option pricing using advanced models such as Heston, Extended Merton, and Extended CGMY.
name: finside
title: finside

api_list.name: computeCGMYSEDensity
api_list.description: Computes probability density for an extended CGMY process
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finside1.p.rapidapi.com/cgmyse/density"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finside1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: computeCGMYSEMetric
api_list.description: Computes value at risk and expected shortfall for extended CGMY process
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finside1.p.rapidapi.com/cgmyse/riskmetric"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finside1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: computeCGMYSEOptions
api_list.description: Computes European option prices, implied volatilities, and sensitivities at every strike price for an asset that follows an extended CGMY process

optional_parameters.name: include_implied_volatility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include implied volatility in the results.  Defaults to 'false'.  Only applicable for sensitivity='price'

api_list.name: computeHestonOptions
api_list.description: Computes European option prices, implied volatilities, and sensitivities at every strike price for an asset that follows a Heston process

optional_parameters.name: include_implied_volatility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include implied volatility in the results.  Defaults to 'false'.  Only applicable for sensitivity='price'
